quote: Do something worth remembering.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: If you pray for rain, be prepared to deal with some mud.
author: Mary Engelbreit

quote: Rest in reason; move in passion.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: You can do two things at once, but you can't focus effectively on two things at once.
author: Gary Keller

quote: Adventure is worthwhile in itself.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Life's too mysterious to take too serious.
author: Mary Engelbreit

quote: Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.
author: James Matthew Barrie

quote: At every moment where language can't go, that's your mind.
author: Bodhidharma

quote: All happiness depends on courage and work.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: TEAMWORK: the fuel that allows common people attain uncommon results.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Don't try to be young. Just open your mind. Stay interested in stuff.
author: Betty White

quote: Failure is feedback. Learn from it and move on.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish.
author: Euripides

quote: The present moment dies every moment to become the past , is reborn every moment into the future. All experience is now. Now never ends.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Wherever you are is the entry point.
author: Kabir

quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: If you don't have time to do it right, when will you have time to do it over?
author: John Wooden

quote: One is never afraid of the unknown; one is afraid of the known coming to an end.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: The source of a true smile is an awakened mind.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: A pessimist is one who makes difficulties of his opportunities and an optimist is one who makes opportunities of his difficulties.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: A clear conscience is the sure sign of a bad memory.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Constantly seek criticism. A well thought out critique of whatever you're doing is as valuable as gold.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Repetition does not transform a lie into a truth.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Nothing is too high for a man to reach, but he must climb with care and confidence
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: What loneliness is more lonely than distrust?
author: George Eliot

quote: A simple rule in dealing with those who are hard to get along with is to remember that this person is striving to assert his superiority; and you must deal with him from that point of view.
author: Alfred Adler

quote: A heart is not judged by how much you love, but by how much you are loved by others.
author: Judy Garland
